column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm giving this place no stars for the gluten free pizza
column2: why bother serving an inedible pizza so that you can bring Gluten Free customers? The regular pizza might be good but for GF
column4: it also took a long time to get the gf pizza which was a waste of time. Hey management
column5: please do not advertise that you serve gf pizza because it was awful and the worst
column6: sorry but I had to write this.
